name: Airborne Elite, LLC
about: Airborne Elite, LLC is a premier flight training institution dedicated to providing efficient and cost-effective, high-quality pilot training. Located on Long Island, we serve as a primary destination for those seeking a Sport Pilot certificate, utilizing our newly acquired Bristell LSA. Our training programs cater to pilots of all levels, from Private Pilot to Commercial Single-Engine and Certified Flight Instructor. We adhere to standards that rival those of major aviation institutions, ensuring our students receive top-notch education and preparation for their aviation careers. With a focus on excellence and safety, Airborne Elite, LLC is committed to helping aspiring pilots achieve their flying dreams.
